title: Use Case 3 Fire-Detection Dataset
description: Semantic model for a public-safety dataset evaluating deep-learning models for fire and smoke detection.

intent.description: Intent of the dataset (fire and smoke detection).

algorithm.description: Object-detection algorithm used (e.g., YOLOv5, Faster R-CNN, EfficientDet, SSD, RetinaNet, CenterNet).

load_time_sec.description: Time in seconds required to load the model.

inference_time_sec.description: Average inference time per image in seconds.

detection_count.description: Number of detected fire or smoke events.

efficiency.description: Efficiency metric comparing detection success against processing cost.

robustness.description: Robustness metric indicating model resilience to noise or false alarms.
